summary:
hello everyone im skull19972 and this mod add over,100 new skills book to the game
it don\'t retexture anything it don\'t interface anything its just a new skills books to improve your skills to many skyrim locations
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone Im skull19972 and this is my mod number 7

Description :
ever wanted to improve your level faster ? ever wanted to have some new skills book to the game ?
here it is Skill and Magic books

This mod add over new 100 skill book to the game 
don\'t worry it don\'t interface anything it don\'t retex anything so the oroginal Skill book is safe i diden\'t change there location i diden\'t do anything to them

Well my mod add new skills book over 100 book to improve destruction books to improve conjuration one handed ECT...

those book are everywhere in cities in houses in dungeons so now you can improve your level faster and your dovahkiin will become more stronger once you find the books ofcourse

Well the special thing to that mod is that i did add a giant a huge chest in the north of winterhold in the snowy places see pic

this huge chest is easy to find trust me its very big so you can see it easely
the chest have all the books together all the 100 book together in one place
trust me when you take all the 100 books and read them your level will be improved 43 level so you will become very strong

but the chest is not easy to open its master and there is a very powerful dragon there who will stop you with many trolls and snow bears

That was my mod skills and magic books 
Enjoy!!!!

goodbye everyone im skull19972 and this is my mod number 7
author: skull19972
